meanings.sent1: She made an overhasty decision without thinking it through.
meanings.sent2: He regretted his overhasty response to the situation.
meanings.sent3: The overhasty squirrel forgot where it buried its nuts.
meanings.sent4: Her overhasty actions caused more harm than good.
meanings.sent5: The overhasty driver missed the turn due to rushing too much.

meanings.definition: Done with excessive speed or haste.
meanings.sent1: The overhasty delivery resulted in damaged goods.
meanings.sent2: The overhasty construction led to many mistakes.
meanings.sent3: The overhasty chef burned the dish by cooking too fast.
meanings.sent4: His overhasty painting left brush strokes everywhere.
meanings.sent5: The overhasty decision to leave early caused them to miss the fun.
